contest-event.event-date:
July 2, 2017 D Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest
Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest
brighouse-march-hymn-tune
Brighouse, West Yorkshire Milnrow: Best march, Best hymn, Best euphonium, Best trombone section, Best soloist - euphonium, Hammonds Saltaire: Best principal cornet, Best basses, Best road march, Best deportment Hepworth: Best soprano cornet, Best trombones on the road march Marsden Silver: Best first section band Skelmanthorpe Prospect: Best second section band: Farnworth & Walkden: Best third section band Gawthorpe '85: Best fourth section band, Best fourth section hymn tune Thurlstone: Best unregistered band
youth bands: 1. Elland Silver Youth 2. Bradford Youth Elland Silver Youth: Best youth soloist - cornet, Best youth deportment Hebden Bridge: Youngest player - Max Creese
July 2, 2017, 9:35 p.m. July 5, 2017, 11:30 a.m.
1 Milnrow Band Mark Bentham
